Thinking of studying at Victoria University?

This is a good place to start. Discover our range of undergraduate and postgraduate subjects.

Explore our Subject areas

Application deadlines

  • 2017 Trimester 3 apply by 1 Nov 2017
  • 2018 Trimester 1 apply by 20 Jan 2018
  • 2018 Trimester 2 apply by 21 June 2018
More Key Dates

  • Future Students

    Study what you love in the culture capital. Make Friends from everywhere. Be ready for your future. Earn a world class qualification from wgtn.

    Future Students

  • International Students

    Get your world class education as an international student at Victoria University of Wellington - New Zealand's globally ranked capital city university.

    International Students

  • Postgraduate Students

    Victoria offers an exceptionally wide range of postgraduate programmes to suit most learning needs. Whatever your aspirations, there's a qualification for you.

    Postgraduate Students

  • Professional and executive Development

    Short courses and programmes at Vistoria for professionals to build their own and their organisations performance.

    Centre for life long learning

  • edX at Victoria

    Vistoria is the first university in New Zealand to partner with the prestigious online course provider edX.

    edX at Victoria

  • Current students

    Information and resources for current Victoria students.

    Current students

  • The Victoria admission process

  • 1

    Check your eligibility

    Admission is based on your previous qualifications and results. You'll need to meet one of the admission tyoes to gain entry to wgtn.

    Check admission types

  • 2

    Choose your degree and courses

    Find the right degree for you, explore our subject areas and programmes.

    Subject areas

  • 3

    Complete your application

    Once you know you're elegible and the degree you want to do, apply to enrol.

    Apply now

  • 4

    After you've applied

    To confirm your enrolment you need to accept your Offer of Study and provide some documentation.

    Your offer of study

  • 5

    Preparing for study

    Get your student allowance sorted, find some accommodation, do a budget and don't miss orientation.

    Preparing for university
